name: popo shop:the office
description:
hello ma frend, this is the office of the all "popo shop" games that will be made very very very very soon,like : popo shop: the office, popo shop:library  

and popo shop: cafe

you dont have to work in real life anymore beacuse you have popo shop and you can have your own job in a small but cool placee.

the characters you can find are the fox and the mouse,you can see them on your desk

or the clouds, they are good friends

enjoy your work at popo shop.

or u dai                                                                                   say thx to Ilinca for the name and the  tv
